Title: Live It Up: The Best of 80s Pop
Description: As someone should have said about pop music during the 80s: You've never had it so good. Pop dominated the decade of Thatcher, the Cold War and massive shoulder pads. So as one of that decade's most colourful exponents, Belinda Carlise, releases a Greatest Hits set, what better time to revisit the period of pop's glorious ten years in the sun? As Frankie and Lionel Richie might have said: Relax and get ready to start dancing on the ceiling!
